description: Process status published by Go Prometheus client library, e.g. memory used, fds open, GC details

targets.expr: sum(increase(total_endpoints{job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", chain=~"$chain", url=~"$url"}[1m])) by (chain, url)
sum(increase(total_caches{job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", chain=~"$chain", app=~"$app", status!="miss"}[1m])) by (method)

title: Web3 RPC Proxy
